title: Haldir, Elf of the Golden Wood (1U48)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Elf
Strength:	5
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Game Text:	To play, spot an Elf. While Haldir is at site 6, 7, or 8, he is strength +2.
Lore:	”'But there are some of us still who go abroad for the gathering of news and the watching of our enemies …. I am one. Haldir is my name.'”
Rarity:	U
